metaTags.metaDescription: Ensure web application availability. Improve the availability of applications affected by overloaded or unavailable infrastructure.

relatedBlades.title: Ensure Application Availability
relatedBlades.subtitle: Improve the availability of applications affected by overloaded or unavailable infrastructure.
relatedBlades.copy: Users expect their mission-critical applications to always be online and available. Internet applications deployed on a global scale are highly susceptible to outages or downtime due to spikes in traffic, high network latency or server outages at the origin. Cloudflare improves application availability by monitoring network latency and server health at the origin, identifying the best resource from which to serve user requests for dynamic content.

features.title: Global Scale
features.description: Cloudflare's global Anycast network spans %{DataCenterCount} cities in %{CountryCount} countries, offering a scalable infrastructure backbone that prevents downtime and unavailability.

features.title: Ease of Use
features.description: Setting up Cloudflare takes as little as 5 minutes. The easy-to-use dashboard enables quick configuration of fine-grained functionalities to improve the availability and performance of Internet properties.

features.title: Integrated Security & Performance
features.description: Cloudflare includes integrated security services to defend against DDoS attacks, customer data breaches, and abusive bots, while preventing performance trade-offs.

relatedBlades.title: Traffic Overload
relatedBlades.copy: Both expected and unexpected network congestion or overloaded infrastructure can degrade performance to a point where websites or applications stop responding.

imageAssetFile.altText: Ensure application traffic overload spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Ensure application traffic overload spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Interactivity and Personalization
relatedBlades.copy: Applications or individual origin servers can experience unplanned downtime and hard-to-troubleshoot outages, preventing visitors from accessing assets. Unplanned downtime includes hardware failures or system failures due to misconfiguration.

imageAssetFile.altText: Ensure application interactivity personalization spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Ensure application interactivity personalization spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Disaster Recovery and In-House Load Balancing
relatedBlades.copy: Assets can also go offline for reasons unrelated to the network, such as manual and error prone disaster recovery or in-house load balancing, resulting in often hard-to-troubleshoot outages involving expensive triage.

imageAssetFile.altText: Ensure application disaster recovery in house load balancing spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Ensure application disaster recovery in house load balancing spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Availability Services
relatedBlades.copy: By protecting the origin from being overloaded and redirecting traffic around congested networks and away from failed servers to healthy origins, Cloudflare improves availability of applications.

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare maximized service quality and minimized service response time for Crisp. It's a commoditization of expensive network infrastructure for the masses. We can't live without it."

columns.title: Ensure Application Availability - More Cloudflare Performance Use Cases - Accelerate Internet Applications

entry_assetFile.altText: Accelerate internet interactivity personalization spot illustration
entry_assetFile.title: Accelerate internet interactivity personalization spot illustration

content.value: Heavy pages and long distances from the origin slow down Internet applications. Accelerate the delivery of static and dynamic content for higher conversions, better engagement, and lower infrastructure, operational, and development costs.

entry_button.elementName: Ensure Application Availability - Accelerate Internet Applications - CTA

columns.title: Ensure Application Availability - More Cloudflare Performance Use Cases - Accelerate Mobile Experiences

entry_assetFile.altText: Accelerate internet mobile experiences spot illustration
entry_assetFile.title: Accelerate internet mobile experiences spot illustration

content.value: Mobile clients introduce performance and content delivery constraints which hurt user experiences. Deliver fast mobile experiences that increase engagement and conversions, regardless of distance to origin servers, device types, or network health.

entry_button.elementName: Ensure Application Availability - Accelerate Mobile Experiences - CTA
